privacy_subtitle8.EN: 8. Amendments to the Privacy Protection Policy

privacy_intro.EN: You are very welcome to use this website. In order to allow you to use the services and information of this website with peace of mind, we hereby explain to you the privacy protection policy of this website to protect your rights and interests, please read the following:
privacy_intro.TW: 非常歡迎您使用本網站。為了讓您安心使用本網站的服務和信息，我們特此向您解釋本網站的隱私保護政策，以保護您的權益，請閱讀以下內容：

privacy_1_desc.EN: The privacy protection policy includes how this website handles personally identifiable information collected when you use the services of the trading platform. The privacy protection policy does not apply to related external pages outside this website, nor does it apply to persons not commissioned or involved in the management of this website.
privacy_1_desc.TW: 隱私保護政策包括本網站如何處理您在使用交易平台服務時收集的個人身份信息。本隱私保護政策不適用於本網站以外的相關外部頁面，也不適用於未受委託或未參與本網站管理的人員。

privacy_2A_title.EN: A. Information You Provide to Us
privacy_2A_title.TW: A. 您提供給我們的信息

privacy_2A_desc.EN: We collect information you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information directly from you when you create an account, subscribe to receive communications from us, communication with us via third-party platforms, request customer or business support, or otherwise communicate with us. The types of information about you that we collect include email address, username, password, and any other information you choose to provide. Additionally, if you make a purchase, we work with a third-party payment processor who may collect additional identifiers and payment information to complete the transaction.
privacy_2A_desc.TW: 我們收集您直接提供給我們的信息。例如，當您創建帳戶、訂閱接收我們的通信、通過第三方平台與我們通信、請求客戶或業務支持或以其他方式與我們通信時，我們會直接從您那裡收集信息。我們收集的關於您的信息類型包括電子郵件地址、用戶名、密碼以及您選擇提供的任何其他信息。此外，如果您進行購買，我們會與第三方支付處理商合作，該處理商可能會收集額外的標誌和支付信息以完成交易。

privacy_2B_title.TW: B. 我們自動收集的信息

privacy_2B_desc.EN: We automatically collect certain information about your interactions with us or our Services, including:
privacy_2B_desc.TW: 我們會自動收集有關您與我們或我們的服務互動的某些信息，包括：

privacy_2B1_desc.EN: 1. Transactional Information: When you make a purchase, we collect information about the transaction, such as product details, purchase price, and the date and location of the transaction.
privacy_2B1_desc.TW: 1. 交易信息：當您進行購買時，我們會收集有關交易的信息，例如產品詳細信息、購買價格以及交易的日期和地點。

privacy_2B2_desc.EN: 2. Device and Usage Information: We collect information about how you access our Services, including data about the device and network you use, such as your hardware model, operating system version, mobile network, IP address, unique device identifiers, browser type, and app version. We also collect information about your activity on our Services, such as access times, pages viewed, links clicked, and the page you visited before navigating to our Services.
privacy_2B2_desc.TW: 2. 設備和使用信息：我們收集有關您如何訪問我們服務的信息，包括有關您使用的設備和網絡的數據，例如您的硬件型號、操作系統版本、移動網絡、IP 地址、唯一設備標誌、瀏覽器類型和應用程序版本。我們還收集有關您在我們的服務上的活動的信息，例如訪問時間、查看的頁面、點擊的鏈接以及您在導航到我們的服務之前訪問的頁面。

privacy_2B3_desc.EN: 3. Information Collected by Cookies and Similar Tracking Technologies: We (and those who perform work for us) use tracking technologies, such as cookies and web beacons, to collect information about your interactions with the Services. Cookies are small data files stored on your hard drive or in device memory that help us improve our Services and your experience, see which areas and features of our Services are popular, and count visits. Web beacons (also known as “pixel tags” or “clear GIFs”) are electronic images that we use on our Services and in our emails to help deliver cookies, count visits, and understand usage and campaign effectiveness. For more information about cookies and how to disable them, see the Your Choices section below.
privacy_2B3_desc.TW: 3. Cookie 和類似跟踪技術收集的信息：我們（以及為我們工作的人）使用追蹤技術（例如 Cookie 和網絡信標）來收集有關您與服務交互的信息。Cookie 是存儲在您的硬盤驅動器或設備內存中的小型數據文件，可幫助我們改進我們的服務和您的體驗，查看我們服務的哪些領域和功能很受歡迎，並計算訪問次數。網絡信標（也稱為 “像素標籤” 或 “透明 GIF” ）是我們在服務和電子郵件中使用的電子圖像，用於幫助提供 cookie、計算訪問次數以及了解使用情況和活動效果。有關 cookie 以及如何禁用它們的更多信息，請參閱下面的 “您的選擇” 部分。

privacy_2C_title.EN: C. Information We Collect from Other Sources
privacy_2C_title.TW: C. 我們從其他來源收集的信息

privacy_2C_desc.EN: We may obtain information about you from other sources. For example, we may collect information you provide to us on our social media pages. Under these circumstances, we will have access to this information from the platform in accordance with the platforms’ terms of use and privacy policy. We may also collect information about you through other websites that provide identity verification services.
privacy_2C_desc.TW: 我們可能會從其他來源獲得有關您的信息。例如，我們可能會收集您在我們的社群媒體頁面上提供給我們的信息。在這種情況下，我們將根據平台的使用條款和隱私政策從平台訪問這些信息。我們還可能通過其他提供身份驗證服務的網站收集有關您的信息。

privacy_2D_desc.EN: We may derive information or draw inferences about you based on the information we collect. For example, we may make inferences about your approximate location based on your IP address or infer that you are looking to purchase certain products based on your browsing behavior and past purchases.
privacy_2D_desc.TW: 我們可能會根據我們收集的信息得出有關您的信息或推斷。例如，我們可能會根據您的 IP 地址推斷您的大致位置，或根據您的瀏覽行為和過去的購買情況推斷您正在尋找購買某些產品。

privacy_3_desc.EN: We may use the information we collect to create an account for you on our websites, process a transaction, to communicate with you, to learn more about our users, and for marketing purposes. We also use the information we collect to:
privacy_3_desc.TW: 我們可能會使用我們收集的信息在我們的網站上為您創建帳戶、處理交易、與您溝通、了解有關我們用戶的更多信息以及用於營銷目的。我們還將收集到的信息用於：

privacy_3A_desc.EN: A. Provide, maintain, improve, and develop our Services, including to debug and repair errors in our Services;
privacy_3A_desc.TW: A. 提供、維護、改進和開發我們的服務，包括調節和修復我們服務中的錯誤；

privacy_3B_desc.EN: B. Personalize your experience with us;
privacy_3B_desc.TW: B. 個性化您對我們的體驗；

privacy_3C_desc.EN: C.Send you technical notices, security alerts, support messages and other transactional or relationship messages;
privacy_3C_desc.TW: C. 向您發送技術通知、安全警報、支持消息和其他交易或關係消息；

privacy_3D_desc.EN: D.Communicate with you about our Services and events and provide news and information that we think will interest you (see the Your Choices section below for information about how to opt out of these communications at any time);
privacy_3D_desc.TW: D. 與您就我們的服務和活動進行溝通，並提供我們認為您會感興趣的新聞和信息（有關如何隨時選擇退出這些通信的信息，請參閱下面的 “您的選擇” 部分）；

privacy_3E_desc.EN: E. Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our Services;
privacy_3E_desc.TW: E. 監控和分析與我們的服務相關的趨勢、使用和活動；

privacy_3F_desc.EN: F. Detect, investigate, and help prevent security incidents and other malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity and help protect the rights and property of InVar and others;
privacy_3F_desc.TW: F. 檢測、調查和幫助防止安全事件和其他惡意、欺騙、欺詐或非法活動，並幫助保護 InVar 和其他人的權利和財產；

privacy_3G_desc.EN: G. Comply with our legal and financial obligations;
privacy_3G_desc.TW: G. 遵守我們的法律和財務義務；

privacy_3H_desc.EN: H. Create de-identified, anonymized or aggregated information;
privacy_3H_desc.TW: H. 創建去識別化、匿名化或聚合信息；

privacy_3I_desc.EN: I. Carry out any other purpose described to you at the time the information was collected.
privacy_3I_desc.TW: I. 執行在收集信息時向您描述的任何其他目的。

privacy_4_1_desc.EN: The host of this website is equipped with various information security equipment and necessary security protection measures, such as firewalls and anti-virus systems. To protect the website and your personal data, strict protection measures have been adopted. Only authorized personnel can access your personal data and relevant processing personnel has signed a confidentiality agreement. Anyone who violated the obligation of confidentiality will be subject to relevant legal sanctions.
privacy_4_1_desc.TW: 本網站的主機配備了各種信息安全設備和必要的安全保護措施，如防火牆、防病毒系統等。為了保護網站和您的個人資料，我們採取了嚴格的保護措施。只有獲得授權的人員才能訪問您的個人數據，並且相關處理人員已簽署保密協議。任何違反保密義務的人將受到相關法律制裁。

privacy_4_2_desc.EN: If it is necessary to entrust other units to provide services due to business needs, this website will also strictly require them to comply with confidentiality obligations and take necessary inspection procedures to determine that they will indeed comply.
privacy_4_2_desc.TW: 如因業務需要需要委託其他單位提供服務的，本網站也將嚴格要求其履行保密義務，並採取必要的檢查程序，確定其確實遵守。

privacy_5_desc.EN: The pages on this website provide links to other websites. You can also click on the links provided on this website to enter other websites. However, the linked site’s privacy protection policy is not applicable. You must refer to the privacy protection policy of the linked site and bear the risks of the site at your own discretion.
privacy_5_desc.TW: 本網站上的頁面提供到其他網站的鏈接。您也可以點擊本網站提供的鏈接進入其他網站。但是，鏈接網站的隱私保護政策不適用。您必須參考鏈接網站的隱私保護政策，自行承擔網站的風險。

privacy_6_1_desc.EN: We may share personal information in the following circumstances or as otherwise described in this policy:
privacy_6_1_desc.TW: 我們可能會在以下情況或本政策中另有說明的情況下共享個人信息：

privacy_6A_desc.EN: A.  We share personal information with vendors that access personal information to perform work for us, such as companies that assist us with web hosting, payment processing, identity verification, fraud prevention, marketing, and technical support.
privacy_6A_desc.TW: Ａ：我們與訪問個人信息以為我們執行工作的供應商共享個人信息，例如協助我們進行網絡託管、支付處理、身份驗證、欺詐預防、營銷和技術支持的公司。

privacy_6B_desc.EN: B. We may disclose personal information if we believe that disclosure is in accordance with, or required by, any applicable law or legal process, including lawful requests by public authorities to meet national security or law enforcement requirements and during other legal proceedings.
privacy_6B_desc.TW: B. 如果我們認為披露符合或要求任何適用法律或法律程序，包括公共當局為滿足國家安全或執法要求以及在其他法律程序期間提出的合法要求，我們可能會披露個人信息。

privacy_6C_desc.EN: C. We may share personal information if we believe that your actions are inconsistent with our user agreements or policies, if we believe that you have violated the law, or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, and safety of InVar, our users, the public, or others.
privacy_6C_desc.TW: C. 如果我們認為您的行為不符合我們的用戶協議或政策，如果我們認為您違反了法律，或者如果我們認為有必要保護 InVar 的權利、財產和安全，我們可能會共享您的個人信息、我們的用戶、公眾或其他人。

privacy_6D_desc.EN: D. We share personal information with our lawyers and other professional advisors where necessary to obtain advice or otherwise protect and manage our business interests.
privacy_6D_desc.TW: D. 我們在必要時與我們的律師和其他專業顧問共享個人信息，以獲取建議或以其他方式保護和管理我們的商業利益。

privacy_6E_desc.EN: E. We may share personal information in connection with, or during negotiations concerning, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company.
privacy_6E_desc.TW: E. 我們可能會在與任何合併、公司資產出售、融資或另一家公司收購我們的全部或部分業務有關的談判中或在談判期間共享個人信息。

privacy_6F_desc.EN: F. We share personal information with your consent or at your direction.
privacy_6F_desc.TW: F. 我們在您同意或在您的指示下共享個人信息。

privacy_6_2_desc.EN: We may also share aggregated or de-identified information that cannot reasonably be used to identify you.
privacy_6_2_desc.TW: 我們還可能共享無法合理用於識別您身份的匯總或去識別信息。

privacy_7_desc.EN: We engage others to provide analytics services on our websites. These entities may use cookies, web beacons, device identifiers, and other technologies to collect information about your use of our Services and other websites, including your IP address, web browser, mobile network information, pages viewed, time spent on pages, links clicked, and conversion information. This information may be used by InVar to, among other things, analyze and track data, determine the popularity of certain content, and better understand your online activity.
privacy_7_desc.TW: 我們聘請其他人在我們的網站上提供分析服務。這些實體可能會使用 cookie、網絡信標、設備標誌和其他技術來收集有關您使用我們的服務和其他網站的信息，包括您的 IP 地址、網絡瀏覽器、移動網絡信息、查看的頁面、在頁面上花費的時間、點擊的鏈接 , 和轉換信息。InVar 可能會使用此信息來分析和追蹤數據、確定某些內容的受歡迎程度以及更好地了解您的在線活動。

privacy_8_title.EN: 8. Amendments to the Privacy Protection Policy

privacy_8_desc.EN: This website’s privacy protection policy will be amended at any time as needed.
privacy_8_desc.TW: 本網站的隱私保護政策將根據需要隨時進行修改。

privacy_9_desc.EN: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us with info@invar.finance.
privacy_9_desc.TW: 如果您對本隱私權政策有任何疑問，請通過 info@invar.finance 與我們聯繫。
